title: 服务器自动关闭
author: 食人黑鹿
txt_content:
-KC1710    开启后自动关闭控制台比平时多了个这个The state engine was in incorrect state SERVER_ STOPPING and forced into state
SERVER_ STOPPED. Errors may have been di scar ded.


一下是崩溃报告

replies.txt_content: 应该是内存问题吧 命令提示符有限制内存吗
